mapper.select: SELECT DRAW_NO ,TITLE ,GENRE ,TRY_POINT ,CLOSE_DATE ,COUNT ,CHANGE_NAME FROM DRAW_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'N' AND ACCEPT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY DRAW_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE DRAW_BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE DRAW_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT DRAW_NO ,NICKNAME ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,CLOSE_DATE ,GENRE ,TITLE ,BOOK_WRITER ,CONTENT ,TRY_POINT ,CREATE_DATE FROM DRAW_BOARD D JOIN MEMBER M ON (D.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE DRAW_NO = #{boardNO}
mapper.update: UPDATE DRAW_BOARD SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE DRAW_NO = #{boardNo}
